lead_paragraph: The increasingly personal lines of attack against Mr. Cruz in a public setting mark a shift in the race for the Republican presidential nomination that started during Thursday’s debate and spilled onto the campaign trail on Saturday.

byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer contributed reporting from Fort Mill, S.C.

headline.print_headline: At Tea Party Convention, Trump Gets Personal in Attacks on Cruz
headline.main: Donald Trump Gets Personal in Attacks on Ted Cruz at Tea Party Convention

snippet: The increasingly personal lines of attack against Mr. Cruz in a public setting mark a shift in the race for the Republican presidential nomination that started during Thursday’s debate and spilled onto the campaign trail on Saturday.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump launches personal attacks against Sen Ted Cruz during Tea Party convention in South Carolina as race to capture Republican nomination intensifies.
